pr_title: Add remaining carat golds to ore crusher

timeline.message: Add remaining carat golds to ore crusher

timeline.bodyText:
Not sure about the balancing aspects of this, whether it should be more or if it's balanced as is.
I can also see lots of people potentially reporting this inconsistency as a bug :/
timeline.author: TheBusyBiscuit

replies.bodyText: It's not exactly inconsistent. It's actually carat / 8.
replies.author: LinoxGH

replies.bodyText:
The suggestion on the Discord suggested 1 dust, no matter how much carat.
I thought this doesn't make all too much sense, so as Linox mentioned, I did carat / 8 and rounded up
replies.author: svr333

replies.bodyText: However, when I was implementing this it did look like whoever had already implemented the idea of a 4carat gold returning 1 dust, had the idea in mind to equally return what was needed to make it

replies.bodyText: You could make it carat / 4 so every 2 dust returns 1. This would be enough to stay away from the bug reports. You could also add only 1 of the gold ingots to sf guide recipes and say that this returns half the carat the gold has.

replies.bodyText: Also I remember there was also 4 carat. Maybe add that too?
